post.body: not when your best friend says it. it changes things. =/
can i call you later?
okaaayyyy. well hope you feel betterr, dude. ^.^
hahaha! xD sorryyyy, I'm feeling random. and tired..... but at least I KINDA cheered you up, right!? :D
I was trying to! xD emo's should laugh more. it's good for their hair.
Please don't cry one tear for me, I'm not afraid of what I have to say. This is my one and only voice, so listen close, it's only for today.
-.- what kinda guy actually calls me "sexy" and expects me to be flattered? it AWKWARD!
hmhmhm. '-'
GASP i'm hyper. i need to find something to do. >.> maybe i'll go draw? @neon_lights btw, nice pic. xD
I'm laughing so hard I'm crying! XD. HAHAHAHA! wowwww.... haha! I'm veryryyy.... *takes deep breath*..... HAPPY. hheehee. :3
~the closer you get to the light, the greater your shadow becomes. But dont be afraid. And dont forget...
The city is burning, the ocean is turning.. Our only chance is the lighthouse.....
oh, what a fun day I have ahead of me. I'll try and enjoy it, though......
should I lie? would it make things better? or worse? what should I do???
WHY is it that guys are more emotional then girls!? WHY OH WHY WHY WHY
Feel the the beat now, if you've got nothing left, say I don't want to be in love, I don't want to be in love...
Weirdos...... I'm surrounded by weirdos. o.o;;
I see skies of blue ..clouds of white. Bright blessed days..dark sacred nights. And I think to myself .....what a wonderful world.<33
I am very spacey today...... sta-range. and I have this song going through my head, and I don't remember what it's called. D:
